value.name: Prince Harry ordered to pay Daily Mail over $60K in legal fees following failed court challenge
value.description: LONDON — A judge ordered Prince Harry on Monday to pay more than $60,000 in legal fees to the publisher of the Daily Mail tabloid for his failed court challenge in a libel lawsuit. The Duke of Sussex is suing Associated Newspapers Ltd. over an article ...
